sentences.sContent: The aseptic design of centrifugal separator and its application are introduced.
sentences.sContent_eng: The aseptic design of centrifugal separator and its application are introduced.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了离心分离机的无菌设计及其在系统中的应用。

sentences.sContent: Your equipment design and aseptic processing operator competencies appear to contribute to the lack of unidirectionality.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your equipment design and aseptic processing operator competencies appear to contribute to the lack of unidirectionality.
sentences.sCn: 你们的设备设计和无菌处理操作人员资质貌似与不能保证垂直气流有关。

sentences.sContent: These EM records provide critical data on environmental trends and whether environmental control is maintained during aseptic filling of a batch.
sentences.sContent_eng: These EM records provide critical data on environmental trends and whether environmental control is maintained during aseptic filling of a batch.
sentences.sCn: 这些EM记录提供了环境趋势的关键数据，以及环境控制在一个批次的无菌灌装期间是否维持良好。

phrases.pCn: 无菌条件，无菌状态；防腐条件

remMethod.val: a(无) + sept(菌) + ic → 无菌的

trans.tranOther: free from living pathogenic organisms; sterile
